paragraphs.english: This charity school is not far from my home. It was set up by my ancestors to help the children in my clan who were poor and could not afford to hire a tutor to teach them. Officials of the clan would contribute silver to serve as the school's expenses. People of high moral standing would serve as teachers.
paragraphs.chinese: 这所义学离我家不远，是当年祖先建立的，为的是帮助族中家庭困难不能请教师的孩子读书。为官的族人会提供银两，作为学中的经费。由德高望重的人担任老师。

Now Jia Rui is also worried that the matter will be blown out of proportion and he himself will also get into trouble, so he has to humiliate himself to seek the help of Qin Zhong and Yu Boya.
